testcase.name: Ticket_21 - Verify message retrieval for ticket 21
testcase.system-out: Given the base URL of the API is "https://dev-soc-fastapi.azurewebsites.net/".passed When a user requests the message from the endpoint "intentclassifier" with parameter "Subject : Go Get Em Tiger (GGET)- Montana Ave/Santa Monica CA - GGET Montana kitchen closing at 2pm Description :@U023631H5QC Montana's kitchen will close today at 2pm. Can you please turn off online food orders at 2pm today? Thank you." and parameter "21" and parameter "2024-6-22".passed Then the user should receive a response with status code 200................passed And the user should receive the output "pause_online_ordering"..............passed

" and parameter "22" and parameter "2024-5-7".passed Then the user should receive a response with status code 200................passed And the user should receive the output "pause_online_ordering"..............passed

testcase.name: Ticket_25 - Verify message retrieval for ticket 25
testcase.system-out: Given the base URL of the API is "https://dev-soc-fastapi.azurewebsites.net/".passed When a user requests the message from the endpoint "intentclassifier" with parameter "Subject Gregorys Coffee - GC38 Description :Hi Team goodmorning, a few customers have been saying the wifi isn't working our music is on and th wifi works on my phone. Thank you in advance for your hel" and parameter "25" and parameter "2024-05-07".passed Then the user should receive a response with status code 200................passed And the user should receive the output "network_alert"......................passed

testcase.name: Test_16 - Add Network Down message to the endpoint
testcase.system-out:
Given the base URL of the API is "https://dev-soc-fastapi.azurewebsites.net/".passed When question "Go to monitor → (https://uptimerobot.com/dashboard?utm_source=alertMessage&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=down-sub-users-pro&utm_content=headerLink#785751700)

GGET - Row is down.

Hello Science On Call,

We just detected an incident on your monitor. Your service is currently down.

We will alert you when it's up again.

Monitor name

GGET - Row

-------------------------------
Checked URL

gget-the-row-rcgkrqbghz.dynamic-m.com

-------------------------------
Root cause

Host Is Unreachable

-------------------------------
Incident started at

2023-09-28 17:35:55

-------------------------------

View incident details (https://uptimerobot.com/dashboard?incidentId=349553224&utm_source=alertMessage&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=down-sub-users-pro&utm_content=viewIncident#mainDashboard)

 Comment incident (https://uptimerobot.com/dashboard?incidentId=349553224&utm_source=alertMessage&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=down-sub-users-pro&utm_content=commentIncident#mainDashboard)

TIP: Keep your teammates notified!

You can now add your teammates to your account and share your resources and monitors. They will have their login credentials and receive alerts about incidents via email, SMS, or voice call.

REOPEN_TIME: 2024-03-16 00:45:00
FULL_PARTIAL_CLOSING: full
ONLINE_ORDERING: false
" and intent "pause_online_ordering".passed When user send a post request to the endpoint "kitchen-normalization/"......passed Then user should receive status code 200....................................passed
